name: The path to domination
storyline: Your character is an unknown person who starts life from scratch. You can become a bandit, a knight, a rebel, a slave trader or someone else. And if you can gain the throne of the Kingdom – it's up to you.
summary: The path to domination is a role-playing game. The plot unfolds in the middle ages. There are bandits, dead and other troubles who operate there. Your character is an unknown person whose life begins with a clean slate. You can become a bandit, a knight, a rebel, a slave trader or someone else. You can also try to win the throne of the Kingdom - everything is up to you.
